too_long.title: Prefix too long!
too_long.description: The prefix can be a maximum of 5 characters long.

not_allowed.title: Not allowed to disable!
not_allowed.description: You first have to set a custom prefix in order to disable the default prefix.

language.description: Allows you to change the language of the bot.

status.description: Allows you to change the bots status.

help.description: Shows a list containing all available commands.

not_found.title: Command not found!
not_found.description: I couldn't find a command with that name
